holidays.title: National No Bra Day
holidays.description: Also known as: "the moment we get home from work" day.

holidays.title: Disaster Day
holidays.description: Let us all work together for our continued survival from natural disasters.

holidays.title: English Language Day
holidays.description: English, being the language with the widest lexicon, is spoken by nearly two billion people worldwide.

holidays.title: International Civility For the Girl Child Day
holidays.description: Let’s end all kinds of discrimination based on gender on this day!

holidays.title: International Day for Disaster Reduction
holidays.description: Disaster management and reduction is an urgent task. We should work to reduce exposure to disasters.

holidays.title: International Day for Disaster Risk Reduction
holidays.description: Join us as we raise awareness about the need for disaster risk reduction.

holidays.title: International Day for Failure
holidays.description: Failure is not something to be afraid of…

holidays.title: International Day for Natural Disaster Reduction
holidays.description: Celebrate the day by participating in different events aimed at raising public awareness of natural disasters.

holidays.title: International Skeptics Day
holidays.description: Skepticism is good in moderation but, today, go ahead and question some of your beliefs.

holidays.title: Karva Chauth
holidays.description: Prepare your hearts as we partake in a spiritual ceremony with benefits for all.

holidays.title: Metastatic Breast Cancer Awareness Day
holidays.description: As part of Breast Cancer Awareness Month, we champion for scientific advances in ​Metastatic Breast Cancer.

holidays.title: National Herpes Awareness Day
holidays.description: Destroy the stigma around the disease that impacts nearly 16% of women.

holidays.title: National M&M Day
holidays.description: They won’t melt in your hand, just in your mouth — we’re talking M&M’s here.

holidays.description: National Train Your Brain Day puts us to the test with some mind-boggling games and puzzles!

holidays.title: National Transfer Money to Your Son Day
holidays.description: Expect your son to finally call home!

holidays.title: National Yorkshire Pudding Day
holidays.description: Yorkshire pudding is iconic according to the Royal Society of Chemistry.

holidays.title: Navy Birthday
holidays.description: Recognize the brave men and women who have served our country — past and present.

holidays.title: World Thrombosis Day
holidays.description: Celebrate World Thrombosis Day, which is an excellent opportunity to learn more about blood clots.

holidays.description: This celebrity is one of the Democratic Socialists of America's first female members elected to Congress.
